timeline.message:
Cache name normalization

Profiling Ankidroid, I realized that ankidroid spent 12 seconds on
startup in the method normalize. That's far too much. I actually have
trouble believing the profiler here. (More precisely it mostly spent
time in "toLowerCase")

Anyway, I added this simple caching method, so that it becomes far
quicker. After all, caching is not context dependant, it always give
the same output to the same input, so we never have any need to empty
the cache, so that's perfect here

timeline.body: ![Codacy](https://app.codacy.com/assets/images/favicon.png) Issue found: [Fields should be declared at the top of the class, before any method declarations, constructors, initializers or inner classes.](https://app.codacy.com/manual/timrae/Anki-Android/pullRequest?prid=5306226)
timeline.bodyText: Issue found: Fields should be declared at the top of the class, before any method declarations, constructors, initializers or inner classes.
timeline.bodyHTML: Issue found: Fields should be declared at the top of the class, before any method declarations, constructors, initializers or inner classes.
timeline.author: timrae
